message:
Yes it does have <httpruntime targetframework="4.6.2"/>

I did a lot of research today and it seems to be a known issue with WCF... bug.  
It's a shame because I'm having some scalabily issue (blocking too many threads) and doing async code would help a lot on that but I have some logic based on the headers of the incoming request which I use HttpContext.Current to get them, like in my IErrorHandler implementation where I can't just copy those value and pass them. Also using the Items list of the HttpContext.
